hello this is chef john from food wishes
with a layered NorCal Nicoise salad

while we're doing potatoes this time

and then what we'll do once our slices

we did thickness and if just to pick a

and our sticks were a half inch wide by
cutting across this way every half inch
we should have fairly nice cubes so as

into the appropriate size so our beans
are set and we will go ahead and

until they're tender not soft not

what I like to do once they've reached

and after letting those drain for a

then I'll go ahead and give those a toss
you simply let them cool down just like
that
and I'd like to give you a very specific

some lemon juice

about a quarter cup of fresh ripe

legally call our Nicoise a NorCal

and once I had that blended together I

contrary to popular belief is totally
